title: "Tattoo Art" script font
content:
I need help ID'ing this font of something similar ![718](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161656im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12455.jpg) ![187](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161656im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12456.jpg)

 [‹ Herbalife font id](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161656/http:/www.typophile.com/node/505 "Go to previous forum topic") [Archive through July 02, 2003 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161656/http:/www.typophile.com/node/517 "Go to next forum topic")
author: samiam

comments.content:
sam.i.am   
   
as a starting point, you might try:   
   
 [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/styles/script.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161656/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/styles/script.shtml)

Also [www.myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314161656/http:/www.myfonts.com/)   
   
type in SCRIPT in the search window and you'll   
see 100s of possibilities.
